com.sonf.core

类 AbstractIOController<S extends AbstractIOSession>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sonf.core.AbstractIOController<S>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IOController<S>
    直接已知子类:
    AbstractPollingIoController

    public abstract class AbstractIOController<S extends AbstractIOSession>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IOController<S>
    A implementation of IOController with some basic functions fulfilled.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      protected java.lang.Object disposalLock

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void activate()
      Set the IOController to be activated when the first sessions will be added to process, and this status will be quit only when all sessions closed This API is used internal, never call it from the outside code.
      void deactivate()
      Set the IOController to be deactivated when the last session was removed(closed) from the processor.
      void dispose()
      Releases all resources allocated by this Controller.
      protected abstract void dispose0()
      This method will release any resources.
      protected void executeRunnable(java.lang.Runnable runnable, java.lang.String suffix) 
      protected abstract java.util.concurrent.Executor getDefaultThreadPollExecutor()
      This method will create and @return a default executor.
      protected java.util.concurrent.Executor getExecutor()
      Get the Executor.
      FilterChainBuilder getFilterChainBuilder()
      IOHandler getHandler()
      boolean isActive()
      boolean isDisposing()
      void setHandler(IOHandler handler)
      Sets the handler which will handle all callback events about the sessions managed by this Controller.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AbstractIOController

        public AbstractIOController(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
        Constructor for AbstractIOController. A null Executor provided will cause a default one created inside this controller. If you provide an Executor created by yourself, you must also manage it by yourself.
        参数:
        executor - the Executor used for handling all threads. Can be null.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getExecutor

        protected java.util.concurrent.Executor getExecutor()
        Get the Executor. Use this API only if you really know what you can do with it.

      • getFilterChainBuilder

        public FilterChainBuilder getFilterChainBuilder()
        指定者:
        getFilterChainBuilder 在接口中 IOController<S extends AbstractIOSession>
        返回:
        the FilterChainBuilder which will build the IFilterChain of all IOSessions which is created by this Controller.

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        指定者:
        isActive 在接口中 IOController<S extends AbstractIOSession>
        返回:
        a value of whether or not this Controller is active

      • activate

        public void activate()
        Set the IOController to be activated when the first sessions will be added to process, and this status will be quit only when all sessions closed This API is used internal, never call it from the outside code.
        指定者:
        activate 在接口中 IOController<S extends AbstractIOSession>

      • deactivate

        public void deactivate()
        Set the IOController to be deactivated when the last session was removed(closed) from the processor. This API is used internal, never call it from the outside code.
        指定者:
        deactivate 在接口中 IOController<S extends AbstractIOSession>

      • dispose

        public final void dispose()
        Releases all resources allocated by this Controller. Please note that this method might block as long as there are any sessions managed by this Controller.
        指定者:
        dispose 在接口中 IOController<S extends AbstractIOSession>

      • isDisposing

        public final boolean isDisposing()
        指定者:
        isDisposing 在接口中 IOController<S extends AbstractIOSession>
        返回:
        true if and if only IOController.dispose() method has been called. Please note that this method will return true even after all the related resources are released.

      • dispose0

        protected abstract void dispose0()
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        This method will release any resources. It is invoked only once by dispose().
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - If the dispose failed

      • getDefaultThreadPollExecutor

        protected abstract java.util.concurrent.Executor getDefaultThreadPollExecutor()
        This method will create and @return a default executor. It is invoke only by the constructor.

      • executeRunnable

        protected final void executeRunnable(java.lang.Runnable runnable,
                                     java.lang.String suffix)

      • getHandler

        public final IOHandler getHandler()
        指定者:
        getHandler 在接口中 IOController<S extends AbstractIOSession>
        返回:
        the handler which will handle all all callback events about the sessions managed by this Controller.

      • setHandler

        public final void setHandler(IOHandler handler)
        Sets the handler which will handle all callback events about the sessions managed by this Controller.
        指定者:
        setHandler 在接口中 IOController<S extends AbstractIOSession>
        参数:
        handler - The IoHandler to use
